row.process:
:SET &AUTOFORECAST_PREFIX# = GET_VAR("UC_CLIENT_SETTINGS","AUTO_FORECAST_PREFIX","1") :IF &AUTOFORECAST_PREFIX# = "" : SET &AUTOFORECAST_PREFIX#="AF" : PRINT "AUTOFORECAST PREFIX SET: &AUTOFORECAST_PREFIX#" : PUT_VAR_COL UC_CLIENT_SETTINGS,"AUTO_FORECAST_PREFIX",1,&AUTOFORECAST_PREFIX# :ENDIF
:SET &AUTOFORECAST_DAYS# = GET_VAR("UC_CLIENT_SETTINGS","AUTO_FORECAST_DAYS","1") :IF &AUTOFORECAST_DAYS# = "" : SET &AUTOFORECAST_DAYS#="7" : PRINT "AUTOFORECAST DAYS SET: &AUTOFORECAST_DAYS#" : PUT_VAR_COL UC_CLIENT_SETTINGS,"AUTO_FORECAST_DAYS",1,&AUTOFORECAST_DAYS# :ENDIF
:SET &RET# = AUTOFORECAST() :IF &RET# <> "0" : STOP MSG, 50, " Error in AUTOFORECAST." :ENDIF
